sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Gamepad2, MessageCircle, X, Send, Users, Plus, User } from 'lucide-react'; const PlatformApp = () => { const [isChatOpen, setIsChatOpen] = useState(false); const [messages, setMessages] = useState([ { id: 1, user: 'Алексей', text: 'Привет всем!', time: '12:30' }, { id: 2, user: 'Мария', text: 'Готовы играть?', time: '12:31' }, { id: 3, user: 'Иван', text: 'Да, создавайте стол', time: '12:32' } ]); const [newMessage, setNewMessage] = useState(''); const [activeView, setActiveView] = useState('game-select'); const [selectedGame, setSelectedGame] = useState(null); const games = [ { id: 1, name: 'Шахматы', players: 2, image: 'https://goods-photos.static1-sima-land.com/items/7283403/1/1600.jpg?v=1681828615' }, { id: 2, name: 'Шашки', players: 2, image: 'https://cdn.culture.ru/images/6bbc49fa-e0c4-570e-afea-4865a0bff0d0' }, { id: 3, name: 'Монополия', players: 4, image: 'https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/get-mpic/5274753/img_id7393167515737377791.jpeg/orig' }, { id: 4, name: 'Каркассон', players: 5, image: 'https://placehold.co/300x200/7c3aed/ffffff?text=Каркассон' }, { id: 5, name: 'Колонизаторы', players: 4, image: 'https://placehold.co/300x200/ea580c/ffffff?text=Колонизаторы' }, { id: 6, name: 'Дурак', players: 2, image: 'https://placehold.co/300x200/16a34a/ffffff?text=Дурак' } ]; const gameTables = [ { id: 1, game: 'Шахматы', players: ['Алексей', 'Мария'], status: 'В процессе', maxPlayers: 2 }, { id: 2, game: 'Шашки', players: ['Иван'], status: 'Ожидание', maxPlayers: 2 }, { id: 3, game: 'Монополия', players: ['Ольга', 'Петр', 'Сергей'], status: 'Ожидание', maxPlayers: 4 } ]; const handleSendMessage = () => { if (newMessage.trim()) { const message = { id: messages.length + 1, user: 'Вы', text: newMessage, time: new Date().toLocaleTimeString('ru-RU', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }) }; setMessages([...messages, message]); setNewMessage(''); } }; const renderGameSelect = () => (
{/* Header */}

Игровая Платформа

Игрок
{/* Main Content */}

Выберите игру

{games.map((game) => (

{game.name}

Игроков: {game.players}

))}
{/* Chat Button */} {/* Chat Modal */} {isChatOpen && (

Чат

{messages.map((message) => (
{message.user} {message.time}

{message.text}

))}
setNewMessage(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSendMessage()} placeholder="Введите сообщение..." className="flex-1 bg-white/10 border border-white/20 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 text-white placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
)}
); const renderGameOptions = () => (
{/* Header */}

{selectedGame?.name}

Игрок
{/* Create Game */}

Создать стол

Создайте новый игровой стол и пригласите друзей

{/* Join Game */}

Присоединиться

Присоединитесь к существующему столу

Доступные столы

{gameTables.filter(table => table.game === selectedGame?.name).map((table) => (
Стол #{table.id} {table.status}
{table.players.length}/{table.maxPlayers} игроков
))}
{/* Chat Button */} {/* Chat Modal */} {isChatOpen && (

Чат

{messages.map((message) => (
{message.user} {message.time}

{message.text}

))}
setNewMessage(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSendMessage()} placeholder="Введите сообщение..." className="flex-1 bg-white/10 border border-white/20 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 text-white placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500" />
)}
); return activeView === 'game-select' ? renderGameSelect() : renderGameOptions(); }; export default PlatformApp;
